info.name: Carousel Images API
info.description: API endpoints for mobile carousel images - dynamic and manageable from dashboard

request.description:
Get all active carousel images sorted by sort_order.

**Features:**
- Public endpoint (no authentication required)
- Returns only active carousel images
- Sorted by sort_order (ascending) then created_at (descending)
- Dynamic - images can be changed anytime from dashboard

**Response includes:**
- id
- title
- description
- image (full URL)
- image_url (storage path)
- link_url (if exists)
- sort_order
- status (active/inactive)
- is_active (boolean)
- created_at
